head.supplied: Hamilton & West: Dist: College ¶ Sept 22nd [1886] ¶ My dear Baron ¶ ¶ I forward you a cheque from Mr W. Moodie of Wando Dale, Coleraine ¶ - the first fruits of the 'Leader' in the 'Spectator'; ¶ an...

div.p: From Henry de la Poer Wall
A39 Royal Geographical Society of Australasia (Vic. Branch) papers, Mitchell Library, State Library of NSW, Sydney.

Hamilton & West: Dist: College
Hamilton, Vic.

Sept 22nd [1886]
Year deduced from position of MS in a chronological sequence of MSS, and from the date of Moodie's election.
I hope I shall have more to follow his Example.
